title: List Dropdown
behaviorsList: List dropdowns provide a quick way to check status on list views or serve as an alternative dropdown for list views.
For tables, columns will highlight selected options with a foreground color (curved border for list views only). The table will maintain the same shape, with only the fill and text color changing.
The maximum number of items is 6.
Options can be edited inline, and changes will be automatically applied to all list dropdowns in the same table or list.
New options can be added if enabled, and newly added options will be automatically included in every list dropdown in the same list.
